description: After football practice, Christian Wilde and Steven Wam decided to kick back and watch a movie at their place. During the flick, the two swap massages; but that's not it. Steven notices that Christian is getting turned on so he begins to give him head. Christian returns the favor, and by the end of it all, Christian has fucked Steven and their balls are empty and it's nap time.Enjoy!
title: Christian Wilde & Steven Wam
